<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script is used to update the active flag in Stakeholder register and synch the values to demand stakeholder m2m table.</description>
        <name>Set stakeholder registry entries</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[setActiveFlag();
synchDemandStakeholdersfromRegistry();

function setActiveFlag(){
	gs.log('Setting Active Flag in stakeholder register');
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addNullQuery('active');
	gr.query();
	gr.setValue('active', 'true');
	gr.updateMultiple();
}

function synchDemandStakeholdersfromRegistry(){
	gs.log('Synching demand m2m from Stakeholder register');
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addNotNullQuery('portfolio');
	gr.addActiveQuery();
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()){
        gs.log('user:' + gr.user.getDisplayValue());
        gs.log('portfolio:' + gr.portfolio.getDisplayValue());
		var dmdgr = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		dmdgr.addQuery('stakeholder', gr.sys_id);
		dmdgr.query();
       
       	dmdgr.setValue('assessment', gr.assessment);
		dmdgr.setValue('engagement', gr.engagement);
		dmdgr.setValue('influence', gr.influence);
		dmdgr.setValue('interest', gr.interest);
		dmdgr.setValue('expectation', gr.expectation);
		dmdgr.setValue('approver', gr.approver);
        dmdgr.updateMultiple();
	}
}]]></script>
